about_the_game:
Havoc Fox is an action platformer featuring two playable characters: Grey and Venice. Each character has their own move set, abilities, and story, split into two separate campaigns. Unlock new abilities by defeating bosses, purchase items and upgrades within the world’s hub areas, and uncover the truth behind the king’s reign of terror through the game’s story and lore!

Want more ahead of time? Try the demo!

The Heroes
Grey and Venice, the two protagonists of Havoc Fox, each have their own styles of gameplay and stories to experience.

Grey
Dazed, confused, and mostly amnesic, Grey finds himself chasing after the king in hopes of uncovering his past. Wield his energy sword, long-range projectiles, enhanced dash ability, and protective shield to fight through the Sentries and learn of his origins!

Venice
As a new enlistee in the Royal Vanalian Air Force, Venice (along her trusty owl sidekick Spooky) teams up with Grey to take down the king and his Sentries as the kingdom is thrown into a civil war. Whip enemies with Venice’s combat goggles, shoot enemies with Spooky’s short-range rapid-fire projectiles, and combine their talents to glide across gaps and hunt down the Sentries!

The Adventure
On your mission to stop the king, you will encounter the Sentries: the king’s royal guard, hand-picked to protect the throne against all opposition. Each Sentry possesses their own unique talents and abilities which can be learned by Grey and Venice upon defeating them in battle. Defeating the lesser enemies of Vanalia will reward you with gemmes: a currency which can be used to purchase items and upgrades throughout the world. Hub areas offer a short break from the adventure where you can speak with the locals, use shops, and partake in various activities. Be sure to check every corner of Vanalia to discover hidden items and secret encounters!

name: Havoc Fox Demo
short_description: Take control of a sword-wielding fox and a dragon/owl duo to fight your way through the fantasy kingdom of Vanalia and stop its tyrant monarch! Havoc Fox is a combat-based action platformer featuring an unlikely partnership tasked with saving their home from its own corrupted protectors.
